#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int MIKE[1000];
int HARVEY[1000];

int main(){
    unsigned int T,N,x;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
        for(int i=0;i<1000;i++){
            MIKE[i]=0;
            HARVEY[i]=0;
        }
        scanf("%d",&N);
        int nbm=0;
        int nbh=0;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++){
            scanf("%d",&x);
            MIKE[x-1]++;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++){
            scanf("%d",&x);
            HARVEY[x-1]++;
        }
        scanf("%d",&x);
        while(x!=0){
            if(MIKE[x-1]>0){
                MIKE[x-1]--;
                nbm++;
            }
            if(HARVEY[x-1]>0){
                HARVEY[x-1]--;
                nbh++;
            }
            scanf("%d",&x);
        }
        if(nbm==N && nbh==N){
            printf("MIKE HARVEY\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(nbm==N && nbh!=N){
            printf("MIKE\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(nbm!=N && nbh==N){
            printf("HARVEY\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(nbm!=N && nbh!=N){
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
    }
}
